import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; class Home extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { data: [{ title: "" }] } } componentDidMount() { this.getData() } getData = () => { axios.get("http://localhost:8081/admin/products").then((res) => { this.setState({ data: res.data.data }); }).catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); } handleDelete = (product_id) => { console.log(product_id); axios.get('http://localhost:8081/admin/delete-products?product_id=' + product_id).then(res => { console.log(res.data); if (res.data.result) { this.getData(); } }).catch(error => { console.log(error); }); } render() { return (

Our Car

{this.state.data.map(item => (

${item.p_price}

{item.p_name} QTY : {item.p_qty}
))}
See More
  • All
  • Men's
  • Women's
{this.state.data.map(item => (
{item.title}
  • {item.description}

${item.price}

))}
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
) } } export default Home;
